basic_report: ASL was acquired on a 3T Siemens Prisma scanner using single-PLD PCASL labeling and a 3D GRASE readout with the following parameters: TE = 36.76ms, TR = 2000ms (0 repeats), 4500ms (8 repeats), flip angle 120 degrees, in-plane resolution 2x2mm^2, 28 slices with 2mm thickness, labeling duration 1803.2ms, PLD 2000ms, with background suppression with 2 pulses. In total, 8 control-label pairs were acquired. M0 was acquired with the same readout and without background suppression.
extended_report: ASL was acquired on a 3T Siemens Prisma scanner using single-PLD PCASL labeling and a 3D GRASE readout with the following parameters: TE = 36.76ms, TR = 2000ms (0 repeats), 4500ms (8 repeats), flip angle 120 degrees, in-plane resolution 2x2mm^2, 28 slices with 2mm thickness, labeling duration 1803.2ms, PLD 2000ms, with background suppression with 2 pulses. In total, 8 control-label pairs were acquired. PCASL labeling was applied with the following pulse parameters: average pulse gradient 0.6mT/m. M0 was acquired with the same readout and without background suppression.
